item.title: [Tutorial] AWS Route 53 DNS Hosting
item.description: Since 2017, after registering my first domain, DNS hosting has always been a part of my research! Today, I want to recommend DNS hosting service Route 53 launched by AWS. Prerequisites: AWS account Domain Create Hosted Zone First, enter the AWS console and search for Route 53. Then click on Hosted Zones at the top left. Click on Create Hosted Zone on the upper left, and then enter your domain name on the right.
